P1 character loader by pressing Z
28246a4e 00000010
48000000 81082804
de000000 80008180
58010000 00000068
de000000 80008180
1200000e 0000000C
12000116 00000001
e0000000 80008000


To force a character change line 6 (0000000C = Maestro), to enable Laila2/Milordo-Z use line 7, 00000001 = enabled
0x00 = Kanchome
0x01 = Kido
0x02 = Tia
0x03 = Brago
0x04 = Zatch
0x05 = Wonrei
0x06 = Zeno
0x07 = RANDOM/Always loads Zatch
0x08 = Zofis
0x09 = Victoream
0x0A = Ponygon/Sunbeam
0x0B = Laila
0x0C = Maestro
0x0D = Zatch
0x0E = Zatch
0xFF = Zatch
